bug.author: williamfzc
bug.description: I still have no idea about that. Really weird. Step 6/8 : RUN pip install --no-cache-dir . ---> Running in bd2aeec2af88 Processing /root ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement opencv-python>=4 (from stagesepx==0.8.1) (from versions: none) ERROR: No matching distribution found for opencv-python>=4 (from stagesepx==0.8.1) it worked fine before. But failed after <denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamfzc/stagesepx/tree/1ba5fe65a9d68bdf6e22b16010680a51ae20db88>https://github.com/williamfzc/stagesepx/tree/1ba5fe65a9d68bdf6e22b16010680a51ae20db88</denchmark-link> .
